#summary Setting up CING

= Setup script =
{{{
python $CINGROOT/python/cing/setup.py
}}}
Will look for installed software and puts the settings into a .csh/.sh to be sourced from your setup.

It will also generate an alias to run cing:

= Test setup =
{{{
cing --test -v 0
}}}
If all is fine it should only list ok at the end of each test.
